short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set your intentions and record your daily actions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Intention meets action tracking with a simple, beautiful UI, birthed from the depths of self-quarantine.

🙋🏻‍♀️ Whenever you open a new tab, you'll see your intention grid!
🙏🏽 Come back each day to record your daily action towards these intentions.
🎛 Toggle to grid view to see a high level visualization of your actions to date.
